content.prompt: In the sixteenth century, Geneva and most other European towns and cities experienced which of the following demographic transformations?

choices.label: Declining populations as a result of diseases from the New World
Rapid growth largely driven by an increase in the birthrate of the urban population

topic.text: 2.8: Causation in the Age of Reformation and the Wars of Religion

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
